title: Lionel Richie - The Collection [2003] DVD9
description:
Lionel Richie - The Collection [2003] DVD9 

Lionel Brockman Richie Jr. (born June 20, 1949) is an American singer, songwriter, actor and record producer. Beginning in 1968, he was a member of the funk and soul band the Commodores and then launched a solo career in 1982. He also co-wrote the 1985 charity single "We Are the World" with Michael Jackson, He is also a five-time Grammy Award winner. 
This album was initially released in the US as a one-disc compilation in February 2003. A limited edition release of the US version included a bonus disc with rare extra tracks. A special edition of the album was released later which includes a DVD selecting highlights throughout this period of Richie's career. The DVD also includes a live performance from Amsterdam and the making of Dancing on the Ceiling. 

Year of manufacture: November 2003 
Country: England 
Genre: Pop 
Duration: 2:06:53
